string.name: wp_care_team_activity_title
string.context: Title for Care Team activity, where patients can see care team members involved in their care

resources.string: Equipe de Cuidados e Provedores Médicos Recentes

string.name: wp_treatment_team_activity_title
string.context: Title for Treatment Team activity, where patients can see who is taking care of them during their hospital stay

string.name: wp_care_team_widget_see_all_label
string.context: Title for button by which patients can access the full list of their treatment team members

string.name: wp_care_team_widget_see_all_accessibility
string.context: Accessibility label for button by which patients can access the full list of their treatment team members

resources.string: Ver todos os membros da sua equipe de cuidados

string.name: wp_care_team_widget_manage_all_label
string.context: Title for button by which patients can access the full list of their care team members

string.name: wp_care_team_list_no_members
string.context: Label indicating that there are no members on the patient's care team.

string.name: wp_care_team_list_providers_added_via_rtls_header
string.context: Section header that displays in the inpatient treatment team list, above the section of providers who were added to the list because they have visited the patient, not because they were on the treatment team.

string.name: wp_care_team_list_providers_added_via_rtls_header_proxy
string.context: Section header that displays in the inpatient treatment team list, above the section of providers who were added to the list because they have visited the patient, not because they were on the treatment team. %1$@ is the patient's name

string.name: wp_care_team_list_providers_currently_in_room_header_proxy
string.context: Section header that displays in the inpatient treatment team list, above the section of providers who are currently in the patient's room. %1$@ is the patient's name

string.name: wp_care_team_list_providers_currently_in_room_header
string.context: Section header that displays in the inpatient treatment team list, above the section of providers who are currently in the patient's room.

string.name: wp_care_team_list_providers_standard_care_team_header_proxy
string.context: Section header that displays in the inpatient treatment team list, above the section of providers who are on the patient's treatment team. %1$@ is the patient's name

string.name: wp_care_team_list_providers_standard_care_team_header
string.context: Section header that displays in the inpatient treatment team list, above the section of providers who are on the patient's treatment team. %1$@ is the patient's name

string.name: wp_care_team_item_about_me_label
string.context: This label appears below the provider card in a display that shows the picture, name, and role of the provider. It is intended to encourage the user to tap on the card to learn more about the provider.

string.name: wp_care_team_item_see_more_label
string.context: This label appears below the provider card in a display that shows the picture, name, and role of the provider. It is intended to encourage the user to tap on the card to perform more actions. Only shows in an outpatient context.

string.name: wp_care_team_close_accessibility
string.context: Accessibility label for the background button that is hidden behind a popup to allow the user to dismiss the pop-up

string.name: wp_care_team_close_button_title
string.context: Label for the button by which patients can exit out of a popup

string.name: wp_care_team_back_button_title
string.context: Label for the back button by which patients can return to the list of care team members

string.name: wp_care_team_error_update_provider_status
string.context: The toast message indicates user tries to update a provider status and an error occurs.

resources.string: Ocorreu um erro ao atualizar o status do provedor médico.

string.name: wp_care_team_success_update_provider_status
string.context: The toast message indicates user tries to update a provider status and succeeds.

resources.string: Você atualizou com sucesso o status do provedor médico.

string.name: wp_care_team_sorting_button_accessibility
string.context: Accessibility label for right bar button by which patients can access a popup with filtering and sorting options for their list of care team members

string.name: wp_care_team_sorting_sort_by_accessibility_hint
string.context: Accessibility hint for popup label that says Sort By, telling the user that they will need to scroll down to hear and select an option

resources.string: Role para baixo para escolher uma opção de classificação em uma lista

string.name: wp_care_team_sorting_sort_by_label
string.context: Label for selector which allows patients to sort care team members in order by name, role, etc.

string.name: wp_care_team_sorting_sort_by_change_confirmation_accessibility
string.context: Label read when patient changes sort by method for care team members in order by name, role, etc. %1$@ is the sorting method.

string.name: wp_care_team_sorting_name_option
string.context: Title for selection indicating that care team members should be sorted by name

string.name: wp_care_team_sorting_role_option
string.context: Title for selection indicating that care team members should be sorted by their role in the patient's care

string.name: wp_care_team_sorting_recency_option
string.context: Title for selection indicating that care team members should be sorted by how recently they were added to the patient's care team

string.name: wp_care_team_sorting_relevance_option
string.context: Title for selection indicating that care team members should be sorted by their relevance to the patient

string.name: wp_care_team_sorting_most_recently_visited_option
string.context: Title for selection indicating that care team members should be sorted by how recently they visited the patient

string.name: wp_care_team_sorting_specialty_option
string.context: Title for selection indicating that care team members should be sorted by their specialty in the patient's care

string.name: wp_care_team_sorting_filter_inactive_label
string.context: Label for switch allowing patient's to show inactive (i.e. not currently assigned to treat the patient) members in the list of treatment team members

string.name: wp_care_team_sorting_filter_inactive_changed_accessibility
string.context: Label read when patient toggles if inactive care team members are shown in list. %1$@ is checked/unchecked state.

resources.string: Mostrar membros da equipe de cuidados inativos: %1$@

string.name: wp_care_team_sorting_filter_hidden_label
string.context: Label for switch allowing patient's to show hidden (i.e. patients hide them before) providers in the list of care team providers

string.name: wp_care_team_sorting_filter_hidden_changed_accessibility
string.context: Label read when patient toggles if hidden providers are shown in list. %1$@ is checked/unchecked state.

string.name: wp_care_team_roles_pcp
string.context: Role title for the care team member that is the patient's primary care provider

string.name: wp_care_team_roles_attending
string.context: Role title for a treatment team member that serves as this patient's attending provider

string.name: wp_care_team_roles_admitting
string.context: Role title for a treatment team member that was this patient's admitting provider

string.name: wp_care_team_member_inactive
string.context: Label indicating that the selected member is an inactive (i.e. not currently assigned to treat the patient) member of the patient's treatment team.

string.name: wp_care_team_member_featured_accessibility
string.context: Accessibility value indicating that the selected member is a featured (i.e. important) member of the patient's treatment team.

string.name: wp_care_team_member_inactive_accessibility
string.context: Accessibility value indicating that the selected member is an inactive (i.e. not currently assigned to treat the patient) member of the patient's treatment team.

resources.string: Não está atualmente ativo em sua equipe de cuidados

string.name: wp_care_team_member_external_accessibility
string.context: Accessibility value indicating that the selected care team member is part of an external organization.

string.name: wp_care_team_member_external_name_accessibility
string.context: Accessibility value indicating that the selected care team member is part of an external organization. %1$@ is the organization name

string.name: wp_care_team_provider_hidden_accessibility
string.context: Accessibility value indicating that the selected care team provider is hidden in the list.

string.name: wp_care_team_member_show_bio_accessibility
string.context: Accessibility hint indicating that the patient can open a brief description of this member of their treatment team

string.name: wp_care_team_toggle_on_accessibility
string.context: Accessibility message announced after users turn the toggle on.

string.name: wp_care_team_toggle_off_accessibility
string.context: Accessibility message announced after users turn the toggle off.

string.name: wp_care_team_checkbox_checked_accessibility
string.context: Accessibility message announced after users check the check box.

string.name: wp_care_team_checkbox_not_checked_accessibility
string.context: Accessibility message announced after users uncheck the check box.

string.name: wp_care_team_popup_send_message
string.context: Label for a button on the care team info popup. Clicking on this button will take the user to an activity by which they can send a message to the selected care team member.

string.name: wp_care_team_popup_schedule_appointment
string.context: Label for a button on the care team info popup. Clicking on this button will take the user to an activity by which they can schedule an appointment with the selected care team member.

string.name: wp_care_team_popup_see_details
string.context: Label for a button on the care team info popup. Clicking on this button will take the user to an activity by which they can view additional information for the selected care team member.

string.name: wp_care_team_popup_hide_provider
string.context: Label for a button on the care team info popup. Clicking on this button will hide this provider in the list.

string.name: wp_care_team_popup_unhide_provider
string.context: Label for a button on the care team info popup. Clicking on this button will unhide this provider in the list.

string.name: wp_care_team_popup_cant_hide_provider
string.context: Label for a text on the care team info popup. It will show up when the provider is external and indicate users can't hide this provider

resources.string: Faça login nesta organização para ocultar este provedor médico

string.name: wp_care_team_popup_cant_hide_provider_with_org_name
string.context: Label for a text on the care team info popup. It will show up when the provider is external and indicate users can't hide this provider in a particular organization. %1$@ is the organization name.

resources.string: Faça login em %1$@ para ocultar este provedor médico

string.name: wp_care_team_popup_cant_unhide_provider
string.context: Label for a text on the care team info popup. It will show up when the provider is external and indicate users can't unhide this provider

resources.string: Faça login nesta organização para exibir este provedor médico

string.name: wp_care_team_popup_cant_unhide_provider_with_org_name
string.context: Label for a text on the care team info popup. It will show up when the provider is external and indicate users can't unhide this provider in a particular organization. %1$@ is the organization name.

resources.string: Faça login em %1$@ para exibir este provedor médico

string.name: wp_care_team_popup_org_not_support_hide_provider
string.context: Label for a text on the care team info popup. It will show up when the provider is external and the provider's home org doesn't support hiding providers

resources.string: Esta organização não suporta a ocultação de provedores

string.name: wp_care_team_popup_org_not_support_hide_provider_with_org_name
string.context: Label for a text on the care team info popup. It will show up when the provider is external and the provider's home org doesn't support hiding providers in a particular organization. %1$@ is the organization name.

resources.string: %1$@ não suporta a ocultação de provedores

string.name: wp_care_team_popup_request_appointment
string.context: Label for a button on the care team info popup. Clicking on this button will take the user to an activity by which they can request an appointment with the selected care team member.

string.name: wp_care_team_bio_no_bio_text
string.context: String that displays in a care team member's biography section if they have not yet chosen to share any additional information about themselves for display.

resources.string: Este provedor ainda não compartilhou informações adicionais.

string.name: wp_care_team_bio_member_today
string.context: Appears below a treatment team member's name and photo to describe to the patient that this member was just assigned to their treatment team today

resources.string: Começou a cuidar de você hoje.

string.name: wp_care_team_bio_member_today_proxy
string.context: Appears below a treatment team member's name and photo to describe to the patient that this member was just assigned to their treatment team today. %1$@ is the patient's name.

string.name: wp_care_team_bio_member_since
string.context: Appears below a treatment team member's name and photo to describe to the patient how long this member has been on their treatment team. %1$@ is an absolute date representing when the treatment team member was assigned to the patient's team (e.g. October 3rd).

string.name: wp_care_team_bio_member_since_proxy
string.context: Appears below a treatment team member's name and photo to describe to the patient how long this member has been on their treatment team. %1$@ is an absolute date representing when the treatment team member was assigned to the patient's team (e.g. October 3rd). %2$@ is the patient's name.

string.name: wp_care_team_bio_member_past
string.context: Appears below a treatment team member's name and photo to when the member is no longer active in the patient's care.

resources.string: Cuidou de você no início de sua internação.

string.name: wp_care_team_bio_member_past_proxy
string.context: Appears below a treatment team member's name and photo to when the member is no longer active in the patient's care. %1$@ is the patient's name.

resources.string: Cuidou de %1$@ no início de sua internação.

string.name: wp_care_team_bio_last_in_room_today
string.context: Appears below a treatment team member's name and photo to describe when the provider last visited the patient in their room. This string is used if the visit was today. %1$@ is the time of the provider's visit to the patient's room.

resources.string: O visitou pela última vez hoje às %1$@.

string.name: wp_care_team_bio_last_in_room_yesterday
string.context: Appears below a treatment team member's name and photo to describe when the provider last visited the patient in their room. This string is used if the visit was yesterday. %1$@ is the time of the provider's visit to the patient's room.

resources.string: O visitou pela última vez ontem às %1$@.

string.name: wp_care_team_bio_last_in_room_date
string.context: Appears below a treatment team member's name and photo to describe when the provider last visited the patient in their room. This string is used if the visit was some date in the past, not today or yesterday. %1$@ is the date (long format: En-US Nov 23, 1937) of the provider's visit to the patient's room. %2$@ is the time of the provider's visit to the patient's room.

resources.string: O visitou pela última vez em %1$@ às %2$@.

string.name: wp_care_team_bio_last_in_room_today_proxy
string.context: Appears below a treatment team member's name and photo to describe when the provider last visited the patient in their room. This string is used if the visit was today. %1$@ is the patient's name. %2$@ is the time of the provider's visit to the patient's room.

string.name: wp_care_team_bio_last_in_room_yesterday_proxy
string.context: Appears below a treatment team member's name and photo to describe when the provider last visited the patient in their room. This string is used if the visit was yesterday. %1$@ is the patient's name. %2$@ is the time of the provider's visit to the patient's room.

string.name: wp_care_team_bio_last_in_room_date_proxy
string.context: Appears below a treatment team member's name and photo to describe when the provider last visited the patient in their room. This string is used if the visit was some date in the past, not today or yesterday. %1$@ is the patient's name. %2$@ is the date (long format: En-US Nov 23, 1937) of the provider's visit to the patient's room. %3$@ is the time of the provider's visit to the patient's room.

string.name: wp_care_team_bio_featured_label
string.context: Label indicating that the selected member is a featured (i.e. important) member of the patient's treatment team.

string.name: wp_care_team_bio_about_me_label
string.context: Label appearing above a treatment team member's personal description of themself

string.name: wp_care_team_bio_role_description_label
string.context: Label appearing above a description of a treatment team member's role in the patient's care

string.name: wp_care_team_bio_role_description_label_proxy
string.context: Label appearing above a description of a treatment team member's role in the patient's care. %1$@ is the patient's name.

string.name: wp_careteam_retrieval_error_popup_title
string.context: Title of the popup that displays the external organizations that we did not receive careteam provider data from (see STR_CT_H2G_ERROR_POPUP_TITLE)

resources.string: A Equipe de Cuidados pode estar incompleta:

string.name: wp_careteam_retrieval_error_banner_text
string.context: Title of the error banner informing the user that there has been an error retrieving provider information from external organizations, and therefore the displayed list of providers may be incomplete

resources.string: A equipe de cuidados pode estar incompleta

string.name: wp_care_team_tutorial_overview
string.context: Tutorial text introducing the patient to the care team activity. %%CARETEAM is replaced with the name of the activity.

resources.string: %%CARETEAM mostra os provedores médicos responsáveis pelos seus cuidados. Tocar na foto de um provedor mostrará mais sobre ele.

string.name: wp_care_team_tutorial_overview_proxy
string.context: Tutorial text introducing the patient to the care team activity. %%CARETEAM is replaced with the name of the activity. %%PATNAME is replaced with the name of the patient

resources.string: %%CARETEAM mostra os provedores médicos responsáveis pelos cuidados de %%PATNAME. Tocar na foto de um provedor mostrará mais sobre ele.

string.name: wp_care_team_tutorial_controls
string.context: Tutorial text teaching the patient how to navigate the care team activity

resources.string: Você pode rolar a tela para cima para ver mais membros da equipe de cuidados (se disponível).

string.name: wp_care_team_tutorial_details
string.context: Tutorial text explaining to the patient that providers no longer on the care team will have their photo grayed out and will be at the end of the list

resources.string: Os provedores médicos que não estão mais na sua equipe podem ser vistos selecionando Mostrar membros inativos.

string.name: wp_care_team_tutorial_details_proxy
string.context: Tutorial text explaining to the patient that providers no longer on the care team will have their photo grayed out and will be at the end of the list. %%PATNAME is replaced with the name of the patient

resources.string: Os provedores médicos que não estão mais na equipe de %%PATNAME podem ser vistos selecionando Mostrar membros inativos.

string.name: wp_care_team_encounter_list_empty
string.context: Text to display in the provider list widget when no care team members have been added for the current encounter. This string will be used if the encounter is an inpatient (hospital) encounter.

resources.string: Nenhum membro para mostrar para esta internação hospitalar.

string.name: wp_care_team_encounter_list_empty_emergency
string.context: Text to display in the provider list widget when no care team members have been added for the current encounter. This string will be used in the context of acute care visits, such as visits to the emergency department, not hospital stays.

resources.string: Nenhum membro para mostrar para esta consulta.
